title: Ikazuchi no Senshi Raidy - Haja no Raikou - Anthology Comic
description:
A collection of stories by different artists, all based on the same series. 

1. Floor 1: Catgirl's Sexual Attack by Akiba Wataru
2. Floor 1: Beware of Mischief! by Fudouran
3. Floor 2: Fingertips of Evil by Kamio 96
4. Floor 3: Tiesz the Devil's Wax of Shame by Yoru No Oto
5. Floor 4: Magic Drug: Dark Elf Anal Teasing by Agagi
6. Floor 4: Transformed Heretic Fencer by Shinama
7. Floor 5: Horseback Trap by Ni Kusu
8. Last Floor: The Final Dream by Miss Black

Based on the Lightning Warrior Raidy game series.
